arts.ttl: Ousmane Dembele Refused POTM Award While Leaving Pitch After Aston Villa 3-2 PSG
arts.sum: Following Aston Villa's win over PSG, Ousmane Dembele was handed the Player of the Match award - he, however, refused to take it home.

arts.ttl: What Man Utd fans said about Marcus Rashford during Aston Villa vs PSG
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford's performance against PSG has been rated by Manchester United fans after turning out for Aston Villa in the Champions League quarter-final second leg. Third one directly leads to a PSG goal," while another said: "Aston Villa's attack breaking down every time Marcus Rashford receives the ball in the final third..."

arts.ttl: Unai Emery blasted for Marcus Rashford decision before latest update on Man Utd transfer
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford was praised for his performance during Aston Villa's Champions League quarter-final second leg against Paris Saint-Germain on Tuesday, only to be substituted by Unai Emery Unai Emery has been criticised for subbing Marcus Rashford as Aston Villa chased a goal in their heartbreaking Champions League quarter-final defeat to Paris Saint-Germain.

arts.ttl: 'Danger': France's media noticed something different about Aston Villa's Marcus Rashford in second leg vs PSG
arts.sum: Despite his best efforts, Marcus Rashford wasn’t quite able to help Aston Villa complete a remarkable Champions League comeback against Paris Saint-Germain. Unai Emery once...

arts.ttl: What Emery did at full-time speaks volumes as Villa plant Champions League flag
arts.sum: Trailing 2-1 on the night at half-time, Villa scored twice in the space of three minutes before the hour mark to turn the game on its head. Konsa and Marco Asensio both missed chances to level the tie, and Ian Maatsen saw his effort cleared off the line by Willian Pacho in the third minute of stoppage time.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery blasted for Marcus Rashford decision before latest update on Man Utd transfer
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford was praised for his performance during Aston Villa's Champions League quarter-final second leg against Paris Saint-Germain on Tuesday, only to be substituted by Unai Emery

arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs PSG viewers blown away by presenter: "Amazon Prime are very lucky!"
arts.sum: PSG's Champions League quarter-final victory over Aston Villa was an entertaining one after five goals on show at Villa Park, but another exciting aspect was presenter Alex Aljoe conducting interview in different languages

arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford has new option as Aston Villa consider £40m transfer clause
arts.sum: Aston Villa have the opportunity to sign Marcus Rashford on a permanent basis this summer transfer window, with the prospect of playing time in the future back at parent club Manchester United slim indeed - but in the event Villa don't pursue a deal, Rashford won't be without interest from elsewhere. Indeed, while he's likely to receive offers to go and play abroad - AC Milan have been linked with a move for the forward, who could join English contingent Fikayo Tomori, Ruben Loftus-Cheek and Tammy Abraham - Rashford is also expected to have an opportunity to remain in the Premier League, even if it isn't at Old Trafford or Villa Park.

arts.ttl: Wednesday’s briefing: Heartbreak for Villa while Bellingham eyes Real fightback
arts.sum: Unai Emery’s side beat Paris St Germain 3-2 in their quarter-final second leg but went out of the Champions League 5-4 on aggregate.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery reveals his Champions League favourite after Aston Villa’s elimination
arts.sum: Aston Villa’s UEFA Champions League adventure came to an end at the hands of Paris Saint-Germain on Tuesday and Unai Emery has now backed his former club to go on…
